UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile information, created on sign-up.

displayName.description: The user's full display name (first and last name).

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

lastListingTimestamp.description: Timestamp of the user's last auction listing.

isPlusUser.description: Indicates if the user has a Plus subscription.

isUltimateUser.description: Indicates if the user has an Ultimate subscription.

subscriptionBillingCycle.description: The active billing cycle for the user's subscription.

subscriptionRenewalDate.description: The date the user's current subscription term renews.

extendTokens.description: The number of auction extend tokens the user owns.

promotionTokens.description: The number of free listing promotion tokens the user owns.

pendingSubscriptionPlan.description: The plan scheduled to start at the next renewal.

pendingSubscriptionBillingCycle.description: The billing cycle for the pending subscription.

pendingSubscriptionEffectiveDate.description: The date the pending subscription will become active.

UserInteraction.title: User Interaction
UserInteraction.description: Records a user's interaction with an item, such as a view.

itemId.description: The ID of the item interacted with.

UserScore.title: User Score
UserScore.description: Represents a user's score and rank in the leaderboard.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last score update.

Watcher.title: Watcher
Watcher.description: Represents a user currently viewing an auction item in real-time.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the user started watching.

WatchlistItem.title: Watchlist Item
WatchlistItem.description: A denormalized copy of an auction item a user is watching.

itemId.description: The ID of the watched item.

category.description: The category of the watched item (e.g., 'alcohol', 'art').

title.description: The title or name of the item.

auctionStartDate.description: When the auction for the item starts.

auctionEndDate.description: When the auction for the item ends.

addedAt.description: Timestamp when the item was added to the watchlist.

Alcohol.title: Alcohol
Alcohol.description: Represents a specific alcohol item listed for auction.

userId.description: The UID of the user who listed the alcohol item.

name.description: The name of the alcohol bottle.

description.description: A detailed description of the alcohol item.

imageUrls.description: URLs of the item's images (up to 4).

age.description: The age of the alcohol in years. 0 indicates no age statement.

startingBid.description: The starting bid price for the alcohol item.

highestBidderId.description: The UID of the current highest bidder.

bidCount.description: The total number of bids placed.

auctionStartDate.description: The date and time when the auction starts.

auctionEndDate.description: The date and time when the auction ends.

isFlashAuction.description: Indicates if the auction is a fast-paced Ubid Flash auction.

isPromoted.description: Indicates if the auction listing is promoted by the seller.

winnerId.description: The UID of the winning bidder after the auction is completed.

extendCount.description: How many times the auction has been extended.

viewCount.description: The total number of times the listing has been viewed.

Admin.title: Admin
Admin.description: An empty object signifying admin privileges. The document ID is the user's UID.

Support.title: Support
Support.description: An empty object signifying support agent privileges. The document ID is the user's UID.

Other.title: Other
Other.description: Represents an item that doesn't fit into other categories, listed for auction.

userId.description: The UID of the user who listed the item.

description.description: A detailed description of the item.

imageUrls.description: URLs of the item's images (up to 4).

highestBidderId.description: The UID of the current highest bidder.

bidCount.description: The total number of bids placed.

isFlashAuction.description: Indicates if the auction is a fast-paced Ubid Flash auction.

isPromoted.description: Indicates if the auction listing is promoted by the seller.

winnerId.description: The UID of the winning bidder after the auction is completed.

extendCount.description: How many times the auction has been extended.

viewCount.description: The total number of times the listing has been viewed.

Iconic.title: Iconic
Iconic.description: Represents a personal item from a celebrity listed for auction.

userId.description: The UID of the user (celebrity's representative) who listed the item.

itemName.description: The name of the iconic item.

category.description: The name of the celebrity selling the item.

description.description: A detailed description of the item and its significance.

imageUrls.description: URLs of the item's images (up to 4).

isFlashAuction.description: Indicates if the auction is a fast-paced Ubid Flash auction.

isPromoted.description: Indicates if the auction listing is promoted by the seller.

extendCount.description: How many times the auction has been extended.

viewCount.description: The total number of times the listing has been viewed.

Art.title: Art
Art.description: Represents a piece of art listed for auction.

userId.description: The UID of the user who listed the item.

description.description: A detailed story behind the artwork, its meaning, and history.

imageUrls.description: URLs of the item's images (up to 4).

highestBidderId.description: The UID of the current highest bidder.

bidCount.description: The total number of bids placed.

isFlashAuction.description: Indicates if the auction is a fast-paced Ubid Flash auction.

isPromoted.description: Indicates if the auction listing is promoted by the seller.

winnerId.description: The UID of the winning bidder after the auction is completed.

extendCount.description: How many times the auction has been extended.

viewCount.description: The total number of times the listing has been viewed.

Plate.title: Plate
Plate.description: Represents a car plate number listed for auction.

userId.description: The UID of the user who listed the item.

category.description: The region or country of the plate.

isFlashAuction.description: Indicates if the auction is a fast-paced Ubid Flash auction.

isPromoted.description: Indicates if the auction listing is promoted by the seller.

extendCount.description: How many times the auction has been extended.

viewCount.description: The total number of times the listing has been viewed.

PhoneNumber.title: Phone Number
PhoneNumber.description: Represents a unique phone number listed for auction.

userId.description: The UID of the user who listed the item.

category.description: The provider or country of the phone number.

isFlashAuction.description: Indicates if the auction is a fast-paced Ubid Flash auction.

isPromoted.description: Indicates if the auction listing is promoted by the seller.

extendCount.description: How many times the auction has been extended.

viewCount.description: The total number of times the listing has been viewed.

Apparel.title: Apparel
Apparel.description: Represents an apparel item listed for auction.

userId.description: The UID of the user who listed the item.

itemName.description: The name of the apparel item.

category.description: The sub-category of the apparel item.

description.description: A detailed description of the item.

imageUrls.description: URLs of the item's images (up to 4).

isFlashAuction.description: Indicates if the auction is a fast-paced Ubid Flash auction.

isPromoted.description: Indicates if the auction listing is promoted by the seller.

extendCount.description: How many times the auction has been extended.

viewCount.description: The total number of times the listing has been viewed.

Bid.title: Bid
Bid.description: Represents a single bid placed on an auction item.

userId.description: The UID of the user who placed the bid.

bidderName.description: The display name of the bidder at the time of the bid.

BidsOnItem.title: Bids on Item
BidsOnItem.description: A record of an item a user has bid on, tracking their bids.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a private conversation, either between a seller and a winning bidder, or a user and support.

participants.description: An array containing the UIDs of the chat participants.

participantInfo.description: Denormalized info about participants, keyed by UID.

itemId.description: The ID of the item, if this is an item-related chat.

itemCategory.description: The category of the item, if applicable.

itemTitle.description: The title of the item, if applicable.

itemImageUrl.description: The image URL of the item, if applicable.

readBy.description: An array containing the UIDs of participants who have read the last message.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: A single message within a chat conversation.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a user notification for events like new messages, bids, or auction status changes.

title.description: The main title of the notification.

body.description: The detailed content of the notification.

link.description: A URL to navigate to when the notification is clicked.

isRead.description: Whether the user has read the notification. Defaults to false.

SupportTicket.title: Support Ticket
SupportTicket.description: Represents a support request created by a user.

userId.description: The UID of the user who created the ticket.

userName.description: The name of the user at the time of creation.

chatId.description: The ID of the chat created when this ticket is handled.

/leaderboard/{userId}.description: Stores user scores for the Hall of Fame leaderboard. The document ID {userId} must match the user's authentication UID.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. The document ID {userId} must match the user's authentication UID.

/users/{userId}/watchlist/{itemId}.description: Stores items a user is watching. The document ID {itemId} is the ID of the item in its respective collection.

/users/{userId}/bidsOnItems/{itemId}.description: An item the user has placed a bid on.

/users/{userId}/bidsOnItems/{itemId}/myB.description: A specific bid a user placed on an item.

/users/{userId}/supportTickets/{ticketId.description: A user's private copy of their submitted support tickets.

/alcohol/{alcoholId}.description: Stores all alcohol auction listings. Each document contains a userId field to link it back to the owning user.

/alcohol/{alcoholId}/watchers/{userId}.description: A list of users currently viewing this alcohol item.

/admins/{userId}.description: Stores a list of admin user UIDs. The existence of a document with the user's UID as the document ID indicates admin privileges.

/support/{userId}.description: Stores a list of support agent user UIDs. The existence of a document with the user's UID as the document ID indicates support privileges.

/supportTickets/{ticketId}.description: A root collection of all support tickets for agents to view and handle.

/others/{otherId}/watchers/{userId}.description: A list of users currently viewing this 'other' item.

/iconics/{iconicId}.description: Stores all iconic celebrity item auction listings.

/iconics/{iconicId}/watchers/{userId}.description: A list of users currently viewing this iconic item.

/art/{artId}/watchers/{userId}.description: A list of users currently viewing this art item.

/plates/{plateId}.description: Stores all car plate number auction listings.

/plates/{plateId}/watchers/{userId}.description: A list of users currently viewing this plate item.

/phoneNumbers/{phoneNumberId}.description: Stores all phone number auction listings.

/phoneNumbers/{phoneNumberId}/bids/{bidI.description: Bids for a phone number item.

/phoneNumbers/{phoneNumberId}/watchers/{.description: A list of users currently viewing this phone number item.

/apparels/{apparelId}/watchers/{userId}.description: A list of users currently viewing this apparel item.

/chats/{chatId}.description: Stores chat conversations between sellers and winners, or users and support.

/chats/{chatId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores the messages for a specific chat.

/userInteractions/{interactionId}.description: Stores records of user interactions with items, used for analytics and recommendations.
